message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,000 is fair. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $10,000. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
